Articles.Content:
One night one of the interns over polished the VAB floor.

After the slippery chaos was cleaned up , the engineers started wondering if a polished rocket would go faster!

The scientists confirmed it makes no difference but the pilots liked the shiny buttons and switches so much, they refused to fly without them.    

A Before and After

BDB

Near Future

Oooh Shiny

Plus some others

More from misc

 

 

Visual Aid for cfg numbers

Do you like shiny stuff?

SpaceDock

Needs:  

TexturesUnlimited

 

I started playing with SSTU labs          Ooh shiny! This made my other engines look rather un-shiny. So I tried the old Textures unlimited default stock mod found here. but I play with Restock and it did some things I didn't want it to. 

Originally just planned to fix the windows, went down abit of a rabbit hole ended up with reflection cfgs for:   

  • Restock
  • ReStockPlus
  • BDB
  • TantaresSC
  • TantaresLV
  • Apus
  • UniversalStorage2
  • NearFuture
  • Airplanes Plus
  • KPBS
  • FTT
  • USI Kontainers
  • KIS
  • KAS
  • B9Aero
  • Heat Control
  • KSCFloodlight
  • Mining Expansion
  • Koose
  • Knes
  • Fuji
  • MOLE
  • DSEV
  • Buffalos
  • DunaDirect
  • CXAero
  • Kerbalism
  • TAC
  • Kerbanov
  • Smart Parts
  • Luciole
  • KK delta pack
  • KW rocketry
  • NovaPunch
  • EL
  • FuelTankPlus
  • Quiztech
  • ModPods
  • Deepfreeze
  • K2Command
  • X-20-Moroz
  • Endurance
  • TGOL
  • KipardSkylon
  • Missing History
  • Space Y Heavy Lifters
  • LBSIRocketFaxtory
  • CST
  • KeR-7
  • AtomicAge
  • LETech
  • JX2
  • Pteron
  • BAE
  • DaMicheal
  • DarksideTech
  • KAX
  • FASA
  • Dmagic
  • Contares
  • SSTX
  • Coatl
  • RLA
  • SXT
  • HabTech2
  • KRE
  • SSPX
  • SCANsat
  • MunarIND
  • RO
  • ROEngines
  • ForgottenRealEngines
  • ReslScaleBoosters
  • HGA
  • Coromat
  • Cryo Engines
  • IXSWarp
  • Mk2.5 Shuttle
  • Mk2 Exp
  • Mk3 Exp
  • Mk3 Hypersonic
  • OPT
  • reDirect
  • RLA
  • SteamPunk
  • PathFinder
  • MKS
  • USI
  • Charyol
  • KSPIE

I split the cfgs into two sections, one with a more metallic shine one with a less metallic shine. 

 

Special thanks to Shadowmage for inspiring the mod and making it possible with Textures Unlimited, don't think I'll ever fully understand the dark voodoo that goes on in TU.

 

 

Licence:  GPLv3

Edited May 5, 2020 by Skonks
Moar cfgs?

ah, yes.... beware of rabbit holes... dark and deep...

congrats on finding the light of day again (and the release)!

Thanks, was a couple times I wished it was darker. Does Notepad++ have a dark mode I'm missing?

Good to be back to launching rockets

8 minutes ago, Skonks said:

Thanks, was a couple times I wished it was darker. Does Notepad++ have a dark mode I'm missing?

Good to be back to launching rockets

 

many ways to get that:

https://draculatheme.com/notepad-plus-plus/

is one.

i will be installing this immediately 

My eyeballs thanks you

Awesome.

I made the restock plus config file (I put everything in the "shiniest" setting).

Quote

@REFLECTION_CONFIG[default]
{
    %enabled = true
}
KSP_MODEL_SHADER
{
    name = Stock_FullMetal
    
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Electrical/restock-battery-375-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Electrical/restock-battery-1875-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Control/restock-rcs-block-dual-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Control/restock-rcs-block-dual-mini-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Control/restock-rcs-block-quad-angled-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Control/restock-rcs-block-quad-angled-mini-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Control/restock-rcs-block-quad-mini-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Control/restock-rcs-block-quint-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Control/restock-rcs-block-quint-mini-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Control/restock-rcs-block-triple-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Control/restock-rcs-block-triple-angled-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Control/restock-rcs-block-triple-angled-mini-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Control/restock-rcs-single-mini-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Control/restock-reactionwheel-1875-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Command/restock-drone-core-375-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Command/restock-drone-core-0625-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Command/restock-drone-core-1875-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Structural/restock-adapter-1875-25-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Structural/restock-adapter-1875-125-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Coupling/restock-claw-625
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Coupling/restock-docking-375-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Aero/restock-nosecone-0625-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Aero/restock-nosecone-1875-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Engine/restock-engine-cherenkov-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Engine/restock-engine-corgi-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Engine/restock-engine-mallet-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Engine/restock-engine-striker-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Engine/restock-engine-torch-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Engine/restock-srb-anvil-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/FuelTank/restock-fuel-tank-probe-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/FuelTank/restock-fuel-tank-probe-2
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/FuelTank/restock-fueltank-sphere-25-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/FuelTank/restock-fueltank-sphere-125-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/FuelTank/restock-fueltank-sphere-325-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/FuelTank/restock-fueltank-sphere-0625-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/FuelTank/restock-fueltank-sphere-1875-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Payload/restock-service-bay-1875-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Resource/restock-oretank-375-1
        model = ReStockPlus/Assets/Resource/restock-oretank-1875-1
        
        
        
    MATERIAL
    {
        shader = SSTU/PBR/Metallic
        
        inheritTexture = _MainTex
        inheritTexture = _BumpMap
        inheritTexture = _Emissive

        excludeMesh = flagTransform
        excludeMesh = Flag

        PROPERTY
        {
            name = _Metal
            float = 0.70
        }
        PROPERTY
        {
            name = _Smoothness
            float = 0.75
        }
    }
    
}

On 3/11/2020 at 1:37 PM, Skonks said:

One night one of the interns over polished the VAB floor.

After the slippery chaos was cleaned up , the engineers started wondering if a polished rocket would go faster!

The scientists confirmed it makes no difference but the pilots liked the shiny buttons and switches so much, they refused to fly without them.    

A Before and After

BDB

Oooh Shiny

Plus some others

More from misc

 

 

Visual Aid for cfg numbers

Do you like shiny stuff?

SpaceDock

Needs:  

TexturesUnlimited

 

I started playing with SSTU labs          Ooh shiny! This made my other engines look rather un-shiny. So I tried the old Textures unlimited default stock mod found here. but I play with Restock and it did some things I didn't want it to. 

Originally just planned to fix the windows, went down abit of a rabbit hole ended up with reflection cfgs for:     Updates up to 1.9,    BG DLC,    ReStock,      BDB,       TantaresSC,      APUS,      UniversalStorage2,     Kerbanov,     FTT,     USI Kontainers&Reactors,      KIS,          KAS,         B9 Aero,       KerbalAtomics,       Heat Control,        KSCFloodlight,       MOLE,        DSEV,      Buffalo,     DunaDirect.

I split the cfgs into two sections, one with a more metallic shine one with a less metallic shine. 

Known issues:  Restock 125 fueltanks & Mk2 fuselages don't quite work, the shine shows on the VAB tiles but not on the part? Working on a fix, open to any suggestions.

Special thanks to Shadowmage for inspiring the mod and making it possible with Textures Unlimited, don't think I'll ever fully understand the dark voodoo that goes on in TU.

 

 

Licence:  GPLv3

is it possible to recolour parts?
The latest version number on SpaceDock ends with a "-" (hyphen) character. Is that intentional?

On 3/12/2020 at 5:33 AM, Challyss said:

Awesome.

I made the restock plus config file (I put everything in the "shiniest" setting).

 

ooh nice I forgot about restock+

I've got BDB filling most of the gaps in my current game

No this just shades the models 

You can use the recolour depot for a full recolour

Whoops should be fixed now

Edited March 14, 2020 by Skonks

Cool. Feel free to add my config to your mod. It's my humble contribution. Just drop me a cent if it makes you a millionaire.

Any news on the mk2 parts being less shiny ?

I dont want to derail the thread, but, thanx for that theme @zer0Kerbal . I've been using a nice "black" theme.
@Skonks you might also be interested in this, if you dont already know of it. (its a custom KSP language for NP++)

https://github.com/JadeOfMaar/NPP_KSPlang

And if you didnt know, once you install your theme of choice, you can tweak it using the "Settings-->Style Configurator" in NP++

Edited March 14, 2020 by Stone Blue

Ok, I love you for doing this. Great work
 

On a different note, would it be possible to include 'Detail' as a property alongside the 'Metal' and 'Smoothness' properties? Would give more depth to parts with details

Thanks for the effort you put into this!

Thank you i will add it in an update.

For the mk2 parts-  they're part of the stock cfg. Problem is all the mk2 parts work without restock, so if i delete them it messes up stock.

I will have a go at blocking it with a MM patch after work. if you want to block them they're in the stock config, in the second section, search for 

model = Squad/Parts/Command/mk2CockpitInline/model 

 model = Squad/Parts/Command/mk2CockpitStandard/model  

Oooh thak you for this, will definitely help me find those sneaky brackets that aren't quite where they're meant to be  

Hmmm i shall have to do some experimenting with detail

I did try adding a colour value with little success, I wasn't trying to makes things gold...

Will see if i can add a detail property, hopefully the detail is added in the model

Fantastic Mod! Makes for some great  explodium-flavored eye candy!

I do have one question, though: I'm not seeing a config for NearFuture in the mod directory and the parts aren't showing the effect. Is there supposed to be a pre-defined config for that mod? I'm fine to do some legwork if it's not intended to be packaged but if it is I figured I'd warn ya (It works for everything else, tho)

@Skonks Do you know why some variants of the Fuel Tanks do not have a metal shine but others do? 1,25 m long fuel tank only first variant has shine, etc ... am I missing something or is this a known issue?

It should be in the mod, which version do you have?

the zip ending 1.3-1 should have a config called TexturesUnlimited_NFsuite

Is this in the stock cfg? I had a similar problem with the restock tanks, got them to work by applying the shader to the textures aswell as the model. Should be easy enough to do a patch for the stock ones, are there any other parts without variants I should add while I'm there?

On 3/14/2020 at 2:37 AM, HebaruSan said:

The latest version number on SpaceDock ends with a "-" (hyphen) character. Is that intentional?

Seriously what on Earth is going on with this mod's version numbers?
Doh! I even put the zips next to each to each other to check, must be time for sleep will fix it quickly now

@Skonks thx for the new version - I installed it via ckan. Will try it out if it works now

Btw do you know how to get such recoloring and texture selection menu like the one shown in the TU Thread for the SSTU part? (First Screenshot left upper corner)

Edited March 19, 2020 by Moofrog

On 3/17/2020 at 1:22 PM, Skonks said:

It should be in the mod, which version do you have?

the zip ending 1.3-1 should have a config called TexturesUnlimited_NFsuite

I wound up reinstalling the mod and it resolved the issue;  I'm not sure certain what version but prolly 1.3-1 given the timing. I also wrote a script to generate configs for mods following the patterns you laid out if you're interested
@Skonks I found another issue with the Parachutes .. for some reason they now look like a balloon. The strings have texture carpets between them. I will add a screenshot later. Forgot to make one..

I think for the recolour Gui you need extra meshes so it knows where to apply the colours, I'm not sure if you could rig it to work off normalmaps?

ah yes sumin about some see through objects and TU don't seem to play so well I will try to block the mesh for the deplolyed part it in the config

Ya know when I was making them I kept thinking, I bet there's a really easy way  but I just don't know how to write the code for it.

Yeah that would be pretty useful thanks

@Skonks I just found out the Recolour Depot lets you recolor the parts to your delight, but then with the mesh switcher your changes are overwritten or ignored.

Also sorry to bother you again, I think I found a mesh bug with the Launch Clamps :

Spoiler

Dunno how easy it is to get into KSP Modding and Unity modding. Maybe I'll give it a shot one day

Edited March 21, 2020 by Moofrog

@Moofrog yeah i think the recolour depot applies a texture over the model, that's what was happening with the tank variants. I think it has a shininess slider

 

Ah I will have to remove them from the cfg, I remember seeing them when I checked stock, but its been so long since i played without restock I wasn't sure if it was wrong or not ha.
